name: Nyan Design System
description:
The Nyan Design System is a simple UI kit inspired by the web 1.0 aesthetic. Use the Nyan DS to build retro designs that will have your users partying like it’s 1999.


So join my web ring, sign my guestbook, and watch my site counter blow up when you duplicate this file and harness the power of the information superhighway.


What's included?

  • Web-safe color palette
  • Web-safe fonts
  • Netscape & IE friendly components


Credits

  • Photos from Unsplash
  • Icons by Pixelarticons
  • Design audio support from Radiohead’s OK Computer
  • Inspiration from the Wayback Machine
